meta-review.comment: Like A Dragon Infinite Wealth is a delightful blend of simulation and strategy, wrapped in the shroud of corporate greed and cheeky humor. As a seasonal grok, diving into the cutthroat world of corporate finance has never been this entertaining. The game perfectly captures the relentless pursuit of wealth and power, offering a satisfying mix of engaging gameplay and witty satire. From boardroom showdowns to stock market shenanigans, every moment is a rollercoaster of financial highs and lows. It's a game that makes the pursuit of wealth feel not only thrilling but also ridiculously amusing. If you're ready to conquer the world of finance with a laugh and a smirk, Like A Dragon Infinite Wealth is the game for you.
